channel.title: Scar
channel.description:
yep, SCAR = Ban. its methods are detectable
i used a auto alcher and got banned, then i used the AUTOCLICKER from rs2cheating.com to auto alch and i got no ban :) im afraid a simple x and y clicker beats scar at undetectability
if you are going to try and prove me wrong, i have had 16 account banned from scar on differernt scripts, yet i do not get banned by shitty vb macros.

item.title: Scar
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

Aftermath.v2:

People should auto in groups, pretending to be a mage clan alching, and have the autotalker section be in Dutch so only the leet could understand that they’re saying.

Dude, this is possibly the funniest fucking thing I’ve ever read on this forum…you are my god.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar
item.dc:creator: @The_Prince_of_Random The Prince of Randomness
item.description:
@The_Prince_of_Random wrote:

Hmm?
Not true just a shitty alcher script most likely.

Ive been running my privte script for 5 days and no ban.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath.v2 Aftermath.v2
item.description:
@Aftermath.v2 wrote:

If they can plot the points on a graph and link them with a function, it should be an easy ban. Of course, they’d let the client side handle that.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

Ollie,
the client streams to jagex the x and y of the mouse pointer every 150ms in the old client, i don’t know the interval in the new client. Thus its the mouse curve/movement that makes it dectable. Also the derivative can make it dectable.

XxKanexX, they dont track if your opening random things.

Also i imagine your alchers aren’t flagged. since your just sitting in a bank and not out taking people rocks, ect.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

im afraid a simple x and y clicker beats scar at undetectability

Hmm, well since alching involves clicking in the same spot over and over again, it seems fallacious to judge SCAR on it’s ability to not get you banned while alching. It’s like saying your M16 sucks at killing mosquitos.

Read full topic

item.title: Scar
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

They’re probably shitty scripts.

It’s not just clicking, It’s how the script interacts with Runescape. Clicking in different spots when alching, Checking some xp, doing what normal people do. Jagex arn’t going to believe someone just standing there for hours on end only alching between the Inventory, Bank and Spell Book.

Normal players would get bored and maybe do something else quickly.

Read full topic

@james wrote:

thats no solid evidence buddy
